overview: Crystal brings 12 years of business; healthcare and technology experience to MetaLogix, Inc. Her experience includes serving as Director of Operations for a $5 million technology consulting business where she was responsible for the financial, planning and administrative aspects of the business as well as serve as a member of the executive committee. Her other experience includes a healthcare services industry, and a healthcare services start-up company. Her knowledge of and experience with finance, financial reporting, treasury and cash management, acquisition, post-acquisition integration, commercial debt facilities, corporate asset/liability management, software conversions, human resources and information technology. She joined the United States Army shortly after her graduation from High School. During her 10 year careerâ€”first in the US Army and then the Army Reserves- she served honorably during the War on Terror and Operation Enduring Freedom.
